titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the low-income housing credit for certain buildings in high cost areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/28/2005--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify buildings that provide a community service facility and are located within 1000 feet of a qualified census tract (designated low-income area) for the increased low-income housing tax credit for buildings in high cost areas.
